definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: I threw the brick because no one else would stop.
sentences.chinese: 我丢砖块是因为没有人停下来，小男孩儿声泪俱下。

sentences.english: People ran wildly as pieces of glass and bricks fell down.
sentences.chinese: 当玻璃碎片和砖块落下来时，人们荒乱地跑着。

sentences.english: Tom pulled at the bricks, but he could not move even one.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆想要把砖块搬开，但是一块也搬不动。

sentences.english: Please give me some bricks. I want to build a new house.
sentences.chinese: 请给我一些砖块，我想要盖一间新房子。

sentences.english: When you shake brick, the mortar in between dissolves.
sentences.chinese: 当震动砖块的时候，夹在其中的砂浆就溶解了。

sentences.english: The hotel lobby was a mess of glass and bricks.
sentences.chinese: 酒店大厅到处是散落的碎玻璃和砖块。

sentences.english: They are the scuffing bricks and moder of the nests.
sentences.chinese: 他们是搬运砖块与筑巢的专家。

sentences.english: Brick buildings will break into individual bricks.
sentences.chinese: 砖块材料则会破碎成一块块更小的砖。

sentences.english: These juts are also functioning as roosts for birds.
sentences.chinese: 这些突起的砖块同时也可作为鸟儿栖息的地方。

sentences.english: Some even plucked the radishes planted in front of the house and carted away some bricks.
sentences.chinese: 有些人甚至摘走了他门前的萝卜而且运走了一些砖块。

sentences.english: Farmers can grind pepper, mix it with elephant waste and form bricks.
sentences.chinese: 农民将磨好的辣椒粉与大象的粪便混合做成砖块。

sentences.english: If they have messed up the whole place with the bricks…Put them in engineering.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们把砖块堆得满屋子都是，那给派到工程部。

sentences.english: The aisle was floored with ancient bricks.
sentences.chinese: 过道由古旧的砖块铺就。

sentences.english: Terracotta and brick too are popular types of floorings.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓦和砖块也是不错的选择。

sentences.english: They often use bricks to build houses.
sentences.chinese: 他们常使用砖块砌房子。

sentences.english: Yeah, but in Jiayuguan, the wall of bricks must be made noticeable.
sentences.chinese: 是的，但是在嘉峪关，用砖块来造的墙一定很显眼。

definition: to build a structure out of layered bricks or stones
